title: EYL #163 High School Basketball League Pays Teens Six Figures
itunes:title: EYL #163 High School Basketball League Pays Teens Six Figures
description:
OTE has become a revolutionary new force in the world of sports. It’s a professional basketball league for high school students. It’s located in Atlanta and has three teams of high school students, who all earn six-figure salaries. The players could make up to seven figures, depending on bonuses and outside endorsements. 


For episode 163, we visited the revolutionary OTE and spoke with commissioner Aaron Ryan and one of the star players, Bryson Warren. We talked about the business model of the league, the athletes becoming pros as teenagers, the ins and outs of the daily routine, merchandise sales, equity ownership for athletes, and more. This is a must-see conversation. #ote #basketball #highschoolbasketball 


EYL University: https://www.eyluniversity.com


Host IG: https://instagram.com/earnyourleisure?utm_medium=copy_link


Guest IG: https://instagram.com/ote?utm_medium=copy_link


Guest IG: https://instagram.com/hesifambryson?utm_medium=copy_link
